name: Balloon's Adventure
description:
It is a Endless Runner and can you beat my score of 30? 
DEVLOG WILL BE ON MY  YouTube channel 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrfGKv7L6SFzNLvdJHttqVQ

Controls :-
Up Arrow to go up
Down Arrow to go Down
Escape to pause/resume 

NOTE!!
FOR SOME REASON IF GAME STOPS PRESS ESCAPE (have no idea why??)

ENJOY AND COMMENT YOUR HIGH SCORE
